Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #100 Jeffery Manor Express, #26 South Shore Express Temporary Reroute at 106th/Torrence
ShortDescription: 100 Jeffery Manor Express, 26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 106th, Muskegon, 104th and Torrence due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#100 Jeffery Manor Express, #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 106th, Muskegon, 104th and Torrence due to street blockage at 106th/Torrence.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with delays near Clark/Division due to earlier police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with delays near Clark/Division due to earlier police activity.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
